{
  output:
// <auto-generated/>
#nullable enable
using System;

public static class TestClass_NonTryExtensions
{
    /// <summary>
    /// This is a non-try variant of <see cref="TestClass.TryMethod(out int)"/>.
    /// </summary>
    /// <remarks>This was auto-generated.</remarks>
    public static int Method(this ref TestClass self)
    {
        if (self.TryMethod(out var v))
        {
            return v;
        }

        throw new InvalidOperationException();
    }
}
}
